## Z-score Normalization

```{r}
original <- matrix(c(
    2,  4,  4,
    5,  4,  14,
    4,  6,  8,
    3,  5,  8,
    3,  3,  9
), ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
original
```


```{r}
means <- rowMeans(original)
stddevs <- apply(original, 1, sd)
cbind(means, stddevs)
```

```{r}
centered <- original - means
centered
```

```{r}
normalized <- centered / stddevs
normalized
```

```{r}
rowMeans(normalized)
apply(normalized, 1, sd)
```
